description: The recipients have been honoured for their work in the health, care and charity sectors.
title: New Year Honours 2021: Four recognised in Bailiwick of Guernsey
title_page: New Year Honours 2021: Four recognised in Bailiwick of Guernsey - BBC News
maintext: The chief operating officer of St John Ambulance, Nicola Harrison, has also become an MBE for her work in the community during the pandemic.
